text.section: There is an Advisory Council for the program.

section.section: The Advisory Council consists of 11 members appointed by the Secretary.

text.section: The Advisory Council shall elect a chairperson from among its members.
The Advisory Council shall meet at least 6 times a year at the times and places that it determines.

A member of the Advisory Council:
May not receive compensation; but
Is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
In consultation with the Advisory Council, the Department shall develop guidelines for the operations of the Advisory Council.
